abstract: United Nations say exiled leaders of Yemen government and Houthi rebels have agreed to hold talks mediated by UN envoy.
lead_paragraph: The warring parties agreed to abide by a resolution calling on Houthi rebels to pull out of major cities, but the U.N. did not mention any halt in fighting.

headline.main: Fighters in Yemen Agree to Talks With U.N. Mediator
headline.print_headline: Yemen Fighters to Talk to Envoy

snippet: The warring parties agreed to abide by a resolution calling on Houthi rebels to pull out of major cities, but the U.N. did not mention any halt in fighting.
